review: We stayed here for a night on way to Badrinath. It's an ok place to stay . Its located close to the temple. Staff are very nice. Food is good. We had some issues with our room. The staff obliged and changed the room.
name: Shuba Padmanabhan

review: A value for money place to stay. Three of us stayed here for a night and the rooms are simple and basic with all the amenities. The owner of this hotel is humble and nice person. Was very helpful whenever we needed some information and assistance. Overall its a nice place to stay
name: jazzwantgill
